content: bring autumn coziness into your home with this beginner-friendly pixel pumpkin crochet pattern this digital pdf includes instructions for 6 different pumpkin sizes so you can make anything from tiny pumpins for garlands and wreaths to jumbo pumpkins for your porch or fireplace > **free pattern is available on our blog click here 1 ** the unique pixel-style texture is created using just slip stitches and half double crochets perfect for beginners and relaxing for experienced crocheters the pumpkins are worked flat in a rectangle then seamed and shaped into a plump textured pumpkin with a stem ***** pattern includes step-by-step written instructions 6 pumpkin sizes from extra small to jumbo tips for adjusting size using different yarn weights & hooks full video tutorial link for extra guidance skill level beginner if you know how to slip_stitch and half_double_crochet you can make this sizing 6 included sizes make smaller pumpkins by using dk or sport weight yarn or go jumbo with super bulky yarn you will need super bulky yarn or yarn of choice crochet hook 6 5 mm or any suitable hook yarn needle & scissors stuffing polyester fill or yarn scraps cinnamon stick wooden stick or crochet stem instructions included twine optional ✨ perfect for fall home décor thanksgiving centrepieces porch or fireplace decorations gifts wreaths or bunting 1 https //www passionatecrafter com/free-crochet-pixel-pumpkin-pattern-6-sizes-video-tutorial/
